channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-8628] NPE in case of shuffle join in tez
item.description:

FAILED: Execution Error, return code 2 from org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.tez.TezTask

set hive.auto.convert.join=false;
select c.c_first_name, c.c_last_name, cd.cd_gender, hd.hd_buy_potential from customer c left outer join customer_demographics cd on cd.cd_demo_sk = c.c_current_cdemo_sk left outer join household_demographics hd on hd.hd_demo_sk = c.c_current_hdemo_sk where c.c_customer_sk < 1000;

Plan (auto.convert.join=false, vectorization on, cbo on,execution.engine=tez)

item.summary: NPE in case of shuffle join in tez

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Overall: -1 at least one tests failed

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12677499/HIVE-8628.1.patch
